alert.note: Alert for Adams; Hall (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:51AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Adams and southeastern Hall Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 650 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wood River, or 11 miles southwest of Grand Island, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Doniphan and Hansen. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 301 and 308. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
